title: First Blood reward?
body:
Just felt it would be great to receive a post-game reward for taking first blood. For plebs like me, extra IP reward would be great, but for those that have ample/too much IP well i'm not sure what would benefit them. Perhaps even a couple LP would light a small fire in someones hunger belly?

If there is an incentive to take first blood, whatever the incentive may be, might make for some explosive game starts. Just a thought.

replies.body:
I think it would be cool if they added like an "achievement" thing. Like:
500 first bloods, unlock an icon.
500,000 cs. unlock an icon.
etc etc

this latest patch riot said they want early games to be more exciting (for pro play) because right now all they are doing is boring lane swaps. so they changed the first blood turret gold thing to hopefully increase the excitement early. But I think your idea would be cool for the 99.99% of players who don't play professionally! that would be pretty fun. although they should just ban it for top laners because once a top laner starts to feed they just don't seem to stop. unless the jungler turns up to help out. (wild generalisation plis forgive)
